verses.verse: For <S%H6726>Zion<s%>'s sake will I not hold my <S%H2814>peace,<s%> and for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>'s sake I will not <S%H8252>rest,<s%> until her <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> as <S%H5051>brightness,<s%> and her <S%H3444>salvation<s%> as a <S%H3940>lamp<s%> that <S%H1197>burns.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and all <S%H4428>kings<s%> your <S%H3519>glory,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> by a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5344>name,<s%> which the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H8034>name.<s%>

You shall also be a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>beauty<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and a <S%H4410>royal<s%> <S%H6797>diadem<s%> in the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall no more be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H5800>Forsaken;<s%> neither shall your <S%H776>land<s%> any more be <S%H559>termed<s%> <S%H8077>Desolate:<s%> but you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2657>Hephzibah,<s%> and your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1166>Beulah;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2654>delights<s%> in <S%H776>you,<s%> and your land shall be <S%H1166>married.<s%>

For as a young <S%H970>man<s%> <S%H1166>marries<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> so your <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H1166>marry<s%> <S%H2860>you;<s%> and as the bridegroom <S%H4885>rejoices<s%> over the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> so your <S%H430>God<s%> will rejoice over <S%H7797>you.<s%>

I have <S%H6485>set<s%> <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> on your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> they shall <S%H8548>never<s%> hold their <S%H2814>peace<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night:<s%> you who <S%H2142>call<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> take no <S%H1824>rest,<s%>
and <S%H5414>give<s%> him no <S%H1824>rest,<s%> until he <S%H3559>establishes,<s%> and until he <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and by the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of his <S%H5797>strength,<s%> "Surely I <S%H518>will<s%> no more <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H1715>grain<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> for your <S%H341>enemies;<s%> and <S%H5236>foreigners<s%> <S%H1121><s%> shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> your new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> for which you have <S%H3021>labored:<s%>

but those who have <S%H622>garnered<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1984>it,<s%> and praise <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and those who have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> it shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> it in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of my <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>"

Go <S%H5674>through,<s%> go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8179>gates!<s%> <S%H6437>Prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5971>people!<s%> Cast <S%H5549>up,<s%> cast <S%H5549>up<s%> the <S%H4546>highway!<s%> Gather <S%H5619>out<s%> the <S%H68>stones!<s%> Lift <S%H7311>up<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> for the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>

<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> Yahweh has <S%H8085>proclaimed<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H3468><s%> 'Behold, your salvation <S%H935>comes.<s%> <S%H7939>Behold,<s%> his reward is with <S%H6468>him,<s%> and his recompense before <S%H6440>him.<s%>'"

They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> them The <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> The <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and you shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> Sought <S%H1875>out,<s%> A <S%H5892>city<s%> not <S%H5800>forsaken.<s%>
